text: Marcellini is an Italian surname. It may refer to *Antonio Marcellini (1937–2010), Italian football player *Luciana Marcellini (born 1948), Italian swimmer *Paolo Marcellini (born 1947), Italian mathematician *Romolo Marcellini (1910–1999), Italian film director and screenwriter *Siro Marcellini (born 1921), Italian film director
title: Marcellini
